did.abstract: The Charles Hallock papers include a biography, handwritten notes on club memberships, essays, and publsihed works by Hallock. One document in the collection is titled Escapes and Deliverances of Charles Hallock. Charles Hallock (1834-1917) was an author, journalist, geographer, naturalist, and explorer. Born in New York City, Hallock was a descendent of Peter Holyoke, one of the original settlers of Southold, Long Island.
